title: Creator documents community history through elder interviews
description: Creator documents community history through elder interviews
content:
Scenario: Creator documents community history through elder interviews
    Given Sam is creating an oral history project for Riverside neighborhood
    When Sam interviews Rose about neighborhood changes over 50 years
    And creates content preserving her memories and insights
    Then the content is shared with the Riverside community
    And community members add their own memories and context
    And Rose receives recognition for her knowledge contribution
    And community history is preserved for future generations
    And the content earns reach to similar history preservation projects
